af03801c50fcd0e1032f1f802f1f801c: Hello, darling! I don't believe we've met before.
5090c3fe5090936e6f6c913d6c913c02: I was wondering if you could give a hand to an old lady.
9945041466ba62af459d510462aefbec: You see, I love kitties! However, this morning I accidentally left my front door open, and by the time I realized it, all 50 of them had wandered off.
abb2aac3544dfe8f4dfe8e560171aac3: Would you be kind enough to help me find them? If you spot any of my kitties just point them out, and I'll figure out how to bring them back home.
